thread.title: Pay Rule Is Latest Target of SEC in Dodd-Frank Revamp
thread.title_full: Pay Rule Is Latest Target of SEC in Dodd-Frank Revamp - WSJ

author: Andrew Ackerman
title: Pay Rule Is Latest Target of SEC in Dodd-Frank Revamp
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”The acting head of the Securities and Exchange Commission is quickly targeting rules long-loathed by the business community, moving for the second time since Inauguration Day to ease some Dodd-Frank financial-overhaul requirements.
Republican Michael Piwowar, who took over shortly after the inauguration, signaled Monday that the commission would take a fresh look at new requirements that companies disclose the pay gap between chief executives and their employees. The move shows the extent to which officials...
